moduleMetadataJson.name: OSX Screen Capture
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module takes screenshots of target desktop and automatically downloads them.
author: Peter Toth <globetother@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: FILETYPE
options.description: File format to use when saving a snapshot (Accepted: png, gif)

options.name: DELAY
options.description: Interval between screenshots in seconds. 0 for no delay
